comment.body:
> [noiamo](#comment_1_14XxpXNGMLsyeQxikacrbQnAFXVyhN5Ngx): Are you using some kind of script for zeromail to automatically read sign and publish new ids (like zeroids python script)? Or you are doing it manually? If so can you share it?
> PS do you think we can use something like that http://127.0.0.1:43110/16KzwuSAjFnivNimSHuRdPrYd1pNPhuHqN and avoid spamming?

Second this, we really need this to be automated I think it will be critical to ZeroVerse IDs growth.
